column2: BRIEF-Armada Hoffler Properties Reports First Quarter 2020 Results April 30 (Reuters) - Armada Hoffler Properties Inc: * ARMADA HOFFLER PROPERTIES REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2020 RESULTS * ARMADA HOFFLER PROPERTIES - SUSPENDS DIVIDEND ON COMMON STOCK AND REDUCES BOARD & CEO COMPENSATION * ARMADA HOFFLER PROPERTIES - CEO LOUIS HADDAD ELECTS TO REDUCE SALARY BY 25% * TOTAL CONSTRUCTION CONTRACT BACKLOG WAS $235.6 MILLION AT END OF Q1 * ARMADA HOFFLER - CO WITHDRAWN ITS 2020 FULL-YEAR NORMALIZED FFO GUIDANCE THAT WAS PREVIOUSLY ISSUED ON FEB 6 * QTRLY TOTAL REVENUES $89.6 MILLION VERSUS $47.9 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Armada Hoffler Properties Q1 Adjusted FFO Per Share $0.25 May 1 (Reuters) - Armada Hoffler Properties Inc: * ARMADA HOFFLER PROPERTIES REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * TOTAL CONSTRUCTION CONTRACT BACKLOG WAS $30.7 MILLION AT END OF Q1. * FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $1.03 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
